page.title: 08DUNNS GUEST HOUSE
page.content: DUNNS GUEST HOUSE IS SITUATED ON THE MAIN ROAD OF WOODHALL SPA .NO SMOKING IN BEDROOMS.THE GUEST HOUSE CAN CATER FOR 13 PEOPLE.GOLFERS STAY FOR 2 OR THREE NIGHTS WHEREAS TOURISTS STAY MAINLY FOR 1 NIGHT.THE GUESTS PAY FOR BED AND BREAKFAST AND AN EVENING MEAL.THERE ARE NO FACILITIES IN THE BEDROOMS.THE GUEST HOUSE IS RECOMENDED BY THE A.A,THE TOURIST GUIDE AND THE RAMBLERS ASSOCIATION.FOREIGNERS COME FROM AMERICA,NEW ZEALAND,AUSTRALIA,GERMANY,DENMARK,NORW AY AND CANADA.SINGLE ROOM:Â£8,DOUBLE ROOM:Â£15,EVENING MEAL:Â£3.75.
